comment: He was very passionate about the subject he was teaching. He was always trying to engage with the class in interesting ways. He is also a generous grader who gives good feedback and wants to help you.

Doctor Herald is a well respected man. His class is simple, and theres no harsh grading. Most of his stuff if completion grades expect for the major essays( which there are only 3 ). Sometimes class with even dismiss earlier than scheduled. Absolute king.

THE BEST PROFESSOR! I took him this year as well as 5 other classes so was very overwhelmed. He was very understanding when I turned something in late and did not penalize me for it. His grading criteria is very clear and he never gave an overwhelming amount of work. We had 3 essays throughout the semester and about 10 discussion posts.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Super sweet and caring professor! He's a very easy grader and all of the assignments were pretty fun to do. Only 3 essays and discussion posts made up our grade (No final). Unfortunately he won't be teaching at ksu anymore, but if he did, I'd take every one of his English courses!

He was very easy grader and not hardcore at all. His lectures are a tad boring, but his assignments are fun and he answers every question youll have and more. Hes a great teacher. Lets you turn in work late if given a proper excuse

My best professor this semester! Very straightforward assignments and very informative in-class lectures. He is very open to helping and super nice. I didn't buy the textbooks but we didn't use them much. Dr. Herald is very understanding and I appreciated that. I wish all my professors were like him, honestly.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: He is a great professor. I would take him again.

Professor Herald is hands down the best English professor that I have had in my entire school career. He was very understanding of my situation when I lost my laptop and had to turn an assignment in late. The class consists of 3 essays, 7 discussion posts, and 2 peer review assignments. Overall an amazing professor that makes his class interesting

Professor Herald is one of the best professors I have ever encountered at Kennesaw State. He is very kind and it is easy to tell he loves his jobs. The entire course is set on writing on research paper which is due at the end of the semester, he has amazing feed back and contacting him is very easy! Take him for Composition!!!

Dr. Herald is probably the best professor I have ever had, he truly cares about his students and their work. He gives tons of resources for you to succeed and is a kind grader and gives real feedback that you can use easily. Class was always quick and informative and he doesn't waste your time, He respects all his students. 11/10!!

I had Professor herald for spring 2022, ENGL1102. He is an excellent professor! Gives clear instructions on what is needed, always try to ask if students needed help, and is understanding if you submit in late work. Overall amazing teacher! Finished with a high A
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I took his hybrid class (only met on Thursdays). He's the perfect professor if you need practice writing. He's not a harsh grader at all. You could get away with not using the textbook. Discussion posts/activities are completion grades. He only has 3 major assignments, though, so you have to score high Bs-mid As to keep an A average.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Amazing teacher that engages with the students a lot and isnt uptight about grades. He genuinely cares about the students and their well being. If I get a chance I will definitely be taking him again.

Professor Herald is amazing! He cares about his students and gives awesome feedback on papers. There are three papers throughout the semester and all work correlates with these papers. He is simply the best english professor ever.

Dr. Herald truly helped me grow as a writer. He's understanding, teaches clearly, and doesn't overload you with a bunch of work. You have to get the "understanding rhetoric" book and "the everyday writer". His class consists of 3 papers, easy discussion posts, and other minor assignments. Take him if you can!

One of the easiest English professors. You will write only 3 papers, the rest of the grades in his class are discussion posts and responses, homework assignments that he rarely gives, and a reflective letter. He also gives a grade for a writing center visit which can be done online. On top of all of that, no final and he doesn't grade hard.

Amazing professor! Cares so much about his students, I had a terrible anxiety attack one time and he excused my absences and provided me with the KSU therapy site. Having a professor who cares about his students so much really makes you feel so amazing. Not only does he care so much about his students but he is just an amazing professor. rec to all

Prof. Herald is one of my favs. He cares about his students, VERY easy going, 3 "major" assignments, easy discussion posts that help with the "major" assignments, and you barely even read from the textbooks (they are free online too). He is a very easy grader. all around dream professor. if theres a spot open, take him!!!
Dr. Herald structures his class greatly. A lot of your grade is dependent upon 3 papers that all build upon each other. He gives great feedback and is always willing to help you with your essays.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Herald is honestly one of the best people you can get for ENGL 1102. The main work is discussion posts and 3 papers; a proposal, bibliography, and 6-page essay (He gives examples that you can help guide you on them). Amazing when giving back feedback and super easy to get in touch with. Take him if you can, you won't regret it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Professor Herald was by far my favorite English professor. He knows how to take care of his students, assigning not too much work because of the pandemic. You'll have to write 3 papers and he gives back amazing feedback and a couple of discussions. He emails back surprisingly fast too! Just an overall amazing professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Professor Herald is AMAZING!!! I was lucky enough to have him for 2 semesters and I loved him! If you have the chance to take him, do it! Only 3 papers per semester, and he lets you choose what topic you want to write about. Such a sweet Professor and always wants to help whenever he can.

Herald is the Kobe Bryant of English professors! Might not be the greatest of them all, but I loved his online class (in a pandemic!) and he was quite nice. If you need your second English credit, take his class! Always remember he is glad to help, and he will answer your questions. Love you, Patrick!!
